name: devlauncher
title: Dev Launcher
description: Quick search and access for projects and files.
author: tanerilyazov

commands.name: project-launch
commands.title: Project Launch
commands.description: Search local workspaces and projects - launch into them with favourite your IDE's and editors

preferences.name: ide
preferences.description: Main application option to open directory with. Will usually be an IDE or any application that can open a directory.
preferences.title: IDE Application

preferences.name: ide2
preferences.description: Second application option to open directory with. Will usually be an IDE or any application that can open a directory.
preferences.title: Secondary IDE

preferences.name: ide3
preferences.description: Third application option to open directory with. Will usually be an IDE or any application that can open a directory.
preferences.title: Third Application To Open With

preferences.name: recentlyOpenLimit
preferences.description: Maximum number of recently opened projects, default is 3
preferences.title: Maximum number of recently open projects

preferences.name: projectContainsFilter
preferences.description: Filepatterns which a project should contain to be included. Should be a semi-colon separated list of filename patterns
preferences.title: Project Matcher Filter

preferences.name: searchDepth
preferences.description: How deep should the directory be traversed. Lower depth will lead to faster results
preferences.title: Search depth
